## PuzzleState.update() method

Creates a new [PuzzleState](./ts-sudoku-lib.puzzlestate.md) which corresponds to this state with updates applied.

**Signature:**

```typescript
update(updates: ICellState[]): Result<PuzzleState>;
```

Result&lt;[PuzzleState](./ts-sudoku-lib.puzzlestate.md)<!-- -->&gt;
